page.title: 17WEST COKER AREA TRADE
page.content: THERE ARE A VARIETY OF SMALL SHOPS IN THE VILLAGES BUT MOST ARE GENERAL STORES. {"CORBETTS" }IN COKER IS A TYPICAL EXAMPLE.IT IS OPEN ON MONDAY TO SATURDAY 8:A.M._ 6 P.M ON THURDAY IT IS A HALF DAY CLOSING. ADULTS ARE THE MAIN CUSTOMERS BUT SOME CHILDREN COME IN BEFORE & AFTER SCHOOL .6 PEOPLE WOKE IN CORBETTS. .THE BUSIEST DAY IS FRIDAY.HE GOES TO CASH & CARRY FOR HIS STOCK. THEY SELL ALL KINDS OF GROCERIES AND HAVE AN OFF LICENCE. {"DODGES"}BUSINESS HOURS ARE MONDAY TO SATURDAY 9 TO 5, SATURDAY 8.30 TO 12.30. THEY ARE A GENERAL STORE BUT SPECIALIZE IN HAVING A BUTCHERS SECTION .THEY GO TO GET THEIR STOCK & PEOPLE ALSO DELIVER TO THEM.4 PEOPLE WORK IN DODGES.FRIDAY IS THE BUISIEST DAY.THEY SELL A LOT OF MEAT .
